summary: All 9 requirements (REQ-13 through REQ-21) have been successfully implemented. The diff shows comprehensive updates to hero section copy, creation of new ProblemSection component, updated service cards, difference section bullet points, power statement with animated gold light streak, contact section updates, about section repositioning statement, background color change to #0B0B0B, and slide-style section transitions via CSS utilities and component wrappers.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple background images in hero section with rotating carousel
hallucinated_features.reason: The hero section implements a 4-image rotation carousel (world-map-routes, hero-cargo-ship, trade-routes-bg, container-terminal) that changes every 8 seconds. The BuildRequest only specified one image: world-map-routes.dim_1920x1080.png for the hero section background.
